name: Flowers in the frame
description:
Game for Ludum Dare 41

Genre: Snake + Flowers/Plants collector

It’s a game about drawing flowers on big canvas using Snake game control. Collect dots and unlocks more plants. 

  • Gray dots will use for plant flowers.
  • Black dots will consume grow values for unlocks different flowers.

Control:

- Spacebar to start the game.
- Left, Right arrows Or A, D for turn left, right.

Also, Available on

* Suggest executable file for best performances. 

** Fixed memory issue.
